With a gesture from the Duke, the servants, who had relaxed, began placing dishes on the table: boiled desert hare with cepeda sauce, aplomage sirian, chukka with vegetables, melange coffee (a strong spice aroma had spread across the table), pot-a-oie drizzled with foamy Caladan wine.

tr_translation: The sly guard officer was right, of course. Everything caught in a sandstorm on Arrakis would be torn to pieces. It was impossible for an ornithopter... and its occupants to survive. The woman and the child were dead. Bribes given to the right people, the enormous money spent to launch an overwhelming attack on a single planet... The cleverly fabricated news to reach the Emperor's ear, the carefully executed plans here, all of these were finally bearing fruit.
es_translation: The stupid captain of the guards was right, of course. Without a doubt, nothing would survive in the path of an Arrakis sandstorm. Not an ornithopter... nor its occupants. The woman and the boy were dead. All the corruptions in their rightful place, the incredible expenses to transport those crushing military forces to the planet... all the cunning reports tailored to the Emperor's ears, the entire vast plan carefully fine-tuned, was finally bearing fruit.
st: Ho hlakile hore mookameli oa sethoto o ne a nepile. Ha e le hantle, ha ho letho le ileng la pholoha tseleng ea sefefo sa sandblast ho Arrakis.
